Description:
Peaceful, private in easy-care surrounds
One of only two, sitting on a block size of 393sqm (approx.),this quiet ground level gem is located at the back of the complex of a fantastic rarely found treed garden allotment, ideal for relaxing and entertaining outdoors.
Astute buyers can look forward to a wonderful future, with the simplicity of this single level dwelling with the fenced north facing front and side garden, with plenty of room to create your own outdoor oasis.
Enter into a separate lounge which also overlooks the garden. The master bedroom boasts double robes with ensuite, two more bedrooms with B.I.Rs that access the bathroom from the hallway, finished with polished hardwood floors and a neutral colour scheme throughout.
The kitchen features new benchtops and splashback. Also provided is a dishwasher, gas cooktop and electric wall oven.
A generous meals area adjoins the kitchen with a large laundry and a separate toilet.

Cooling and heating is provided with split system air conditioning and Brivas ducted heating to all rooms.
Great transport options with bus services just a few short steps away, close to Ruffey Lake Park and Schramms Reserve.
Easy access to Westfield Doncaster Shoppingtown and in the catchment areas of Doncaster Gardens Primary School and Doncaster Secondary College.
